resources.name: The Great Big List of Talkers and Talk-Oriented Muds

resources.description: Like this talker archive, but for MUDs
resources.name: MudMuseum

dataOrigins.name: the wayback archive of its homepage
The Great Big List of Talkers and Talk-Oriented Muds
Moe's talker listing on Dark Fantastic Net

codebases.name: VagraNT
codebases.description: A talker running as a Windows NT service

multiWorlds.name: Fantasia's Multiple Worlds
multiWorlds.description:
Fantasia's multiple worlds was an adult-orientated talker that ran NUTS 2.1. It began initially while "Fantasia" was Super User of lintilla in 1995, then was hosted on lintilla itself, and eventually became its own Multiple Worlds in its own right.
It operated from July 1995-late 2002.

Lintilla was started in 1994 by Bushtail. Bushtail had a vision, which eventually evolved into what Lintilla is today. She envisioned a place in which women were free to explore the different aspects of their sexuality in a secure and friendly environment.
It was her idea that this could most effectively be accomplished by having a talker that was completely managed and administered by women...and so Lintilla Multiple Worlds was born.
multiWorlds.name: Lintilla's Multiple Worlds

multiWorlds.description: The planes of existence talker was inspired by lintilla, as an adult-orientated multiple worlds talker and Envirochat|Envirochat, for its human rights elements.
multiWorlds.name: The Planes of Existence

talkers.name: Mope Mansions
talkers.description: Mope was a quiet talker, mostly the testing area for features destined for Atlantis.

talkers.name: Addicted
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Addictive.

talkers.name: Addictive
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Addicted.

talkers.name: Alcatraz
talkers.description: We have taken the average Ew-Too talker and set it up to resemble a prison. We have renamed the Admins to Warden... and SU's to Guards, etc. We have Smokes as our talker's currency to buy and manipulate cool stuff in our net world. We have cool socials and room descriptions that will make your Coed experience of our Prison life interesting to say the least. We also have a few games for you to play while at Alcatraz. There is Paper Rock Scissors, Dice, slots, familiars, and now you can even morph yourself into just about anything.

talkers.name: Atlantis
talkers.notes: Originally based on Sensi-Summink, but extended heavily, first by Swish, and then later by Muppet, Atlantis was a smaller talker with a core of regulars who were prepared to put up with a lot of sarcasm and in-jokes - but it still welcomed newbies if they didn't mind the "relaxed rules".

talkers.name: Atlantis II
talkers.description: This place is Atlantis-][, one of the best talkers on the net today. Atlantis has achieved this through the belief that our users make the talker what it is. Our Staff is always ready to assist you in any way they can. Over 1000 people daily come to chat there...

talkers.name: The Wilderness
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Wilderness Chat.

talkers.name: Wilderness Chat
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Wilderness.

talkers.name: Forgotten Island
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Forgotten Isle.

talkers.name: Forgotten Isle
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Forgotten Island.
talkers.notes:
The Lost Isles Talkers consist of two talkers. Forgotten Isle was created first with a general theme. It is currently running on the SiNCO code.
See also: Dragon's Isle.

talkers.name: The 'Burbs
talkers.description:
The 'Burbs is a social type talker with multiple rooms. The system rooms all have a suburbs-like description, hence the name.
New players may log in at any time but must ask a Superuser for 'residency' in order to have their character saved.
Once a resident you will not only be saved, but will be able to send mail to other players, created rooms of your own, have a friends list, set sessions, and post news. This is a very friendly atmosphere, troublemakers are not tolerated!

talkers.name: Camelot
talkers.description: An all ages talker embracing the romance from the greatest legend ever -- Camelot. There is a collection of files online dealing with romance and relationships that is avaiable to all users. The staff is friendly and courteous, and atmosphere is light and fun. Many socials and original features are there to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

talkers.name: The Castle
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Castle.

talkers.name: Castle
talkers.description: Castle was started back in ye last millennium by ye olde peasant Cheesetong and ye olde miser Beaver. Together with ay small bande of merrie spods they went about their duties forming a bande of cut-throats, peasants and thieves and generaly any mad person who wanted to join.
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Castle.

talkers.name: Kharduin's Zoo
talkers.description: Kharduin's Zoo is 24-hour service that allows anyone with access to the Internet to log on and chat with other users free of charge. Affectionately known as "Da Zoo," the talker operates with one thought in mind: Maximum fun for everyone!

talkers.name: The Caverns
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Caves.

talkers.name: The Caves
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Caves.

talkers.name: Caves
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Caves.
talkers.description:
Caves is a 3 year old talker based loosely on the neanderthal/dinosaur eras.
It is now out of its infancy, and is growing in size every day.
It is certainly small and friendly, and always welcomes any new users into its family like atmosphere.

talkers.name: Central Perk
talkers.notes: Central Perk ran from 2001 to 2025.
talkers.description:
Come and hang out with people from all over the world - virtually! Meet new people, share stories, experiences, and chat. Whether you want to escape reality or vent about it, there are always people around to relax and pass time with.
The friends at Central Perk are just like you! Looking for a talker where they can hang out and immerse themselves in conversations varying from the weather to the latest Friends episode, to spiritual and philosophical debates.

talkers.name: Children of the Night
talkers.description: We cater ta the forsaken o'society - gays, lesbians, bisexuals, transsexuals, crossdressers, goths, pagans, & freaks in general. Normal people are welcome.  Its jist that they scare us *grin*.

talkers.name: Crazylands
talkers.description:
CrazyLands is a cozy, secure talker with a friendly environment. Sure, sure...other talkers claim that they are the best, but we all know the truth. If you want to have fun being silly and talking to lots of interesting people all over the world, CrazyLands is the place to be.
Don't worry if you don't know what you're doing, our dedicated staff listen to suggestions and are always willing to help out. So what are you waiting for? Step inside and join the CrazyLands family.

talkers.name: Dusk Till Dawn
talkers.description: A Dragonlance-themed talker.

talkers.name: Elite
talkers.description: Heavily modified ewtoo talker based on Elite

talkers.name: Snowplains
talkers.description: The theme of the talker (or MUG or MUSH or whatever you wish to call it, but it's not really a MUD) is, erm, a snowplain. The guides, superusers and admin are all penguins of varying sorts (Chocolate, Royal and King/Emperor as appropriate).

talkers.name: Unknown
talkers.notes: This talker was found listed under the name "unknown" but it's possible mutliple talkers share this name.

talkers.name: UglyMUG
talkers.description:
UglyMUG is an online, interactive, user-extensible world. It is the longest running in the UK.
Here people from around the world meet 24 hours a day, make friends, and form their own little communities. The landscape of Ugly is made of places that vary from the fantastic and enchanting, to the downright surreal and confusing. Ugly is not one specific game that can be described, rather it is a collection of the creative output of its players so it is constantly evolving.

talkers.name: Somewhere Else
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Elsewhere or Elsewhere.

resources.name: Foothills was the best talker ever, even though I never met burble

talkers.name: The Plane of Magic
aka: The Plane of Magic and Religion

talkers.name: The Place of Dolphins
talkers.notes: Was originally The Plane of Peace until 1998.

talkers.name: Forest
talkers.notes: Forest was one of a very few talkers that did not have any admins.

talkers.name: North Keep
talkers.description: Gorean role play fantasy realm.

talkers.name: Paradox
talkers.description: Ours is a queer safe talker that has been on the net for the past 5 years or so. We are a large community of people from around the world who share many interests and come online to meet new friends and chat with old ones. We protect all our users against any persons who come to our talker to harass our community and will take whatever measures are necessary to resolve those problems.

talkers.name: Dark Shadows
talkers.description: An EW-style talker, loosely based on White Wolf's roleplaying game Vampire: the Masquerade.

talkers.name: The Resort
talkers.description: The Resort is a free, full featured virtual chat community, specially designed to be a fun, comfortable, and secure atmosphere to make new friends, and meet people.

talkers.name: Marble Madness
talkers.notes: The talker eventually became Surfers

talkers.name: Surfers
talkers.description: A talker inhabited by a group of lazy long-haired, tanned layabouts who bum around on the beach all day desperately trying not to do any work.

talkers.name: Scarlet Citadel
talkers.description:
A friendly place to chitchat.
Scarlet is a medieval themed talker that has been running for around 8 years now.
The chat comes from our wide and ever growing user base. Scarlet has over 100 users, from different backgrounds and countries. Everyone is welcome to join in, which makes the topic of conversation diverse and always interesting.
Scarlet has lots of fun features including, Objects, Socials, Internal/External emails, Ranks and privs and bots.
talkers.notes: Although not a mud Scarlet is a talker that mudders may enjoy, many of members do mud on a regular basis.

talkers.name: Playground
talkers.disambiguation: Replaced by Playground Too.

talkers.name: Playground Too
talkers.disambiguation: Replaced Playground.

talkers.name: Temple
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Temple 2K.

talkers.name: Temple 2K
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Temple.

talkers.name: Enchantment Under The Sea
talkers.description:
Enchantment Under the Sea is the world's most popular NUTS based English language Talker -- Come join us under the sea! Meet hundreds of interesting and diverse users, play games, and get your own free email address and subdomain.
MUD user friendly.
talkers.notes: Imagine diving into an underwater world, one full of magical places to explore. Imagine meeting and interacting with thousands of pepole from around the world. Imagine dozens of games, hundreds of commands, and fun events and activities you can enjoy with other users. Imagination is not necessary, for this is reality. Won't you give us a try?

talkers.name: Emerald Isle
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Fantasia Emerald Isle.

talkers.name: Retro Bar
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Retro Chat.

talkers.name: Selva Virtual
talkers.description: O primeiro e ainda existente Mundo Virtual Portugus...

talkers.name: Dominia
talkers.description:
Dominia: The Multiverse of Existence.
Dominia is a talker where you can meet other people, talk, go to various rooms, execute commands, write messages on the boards, mail other people, and a wide variety of other things.
Theme wise, in the Magic: The Gathering universe, Dominia is the name for "the multiverse of existence", a group of "planes", or seperate universes, all linked together. Powerful spellcrafters called Planeswalkers have the ablity to transcend these planes at will.

talkers.name: The Matrix
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Shell Matrix.

talkers.name: Shell Matrix
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Matrix.

talkers.name: The Dating Game
talkers.description: 100% more cheese than other talkers ...

talkers.name: Alice's Looking Glass
talkers.description: A very friendly adult talker with a Lewis Carroll theme!

talkers.name: Star Trek: Resurrection
talkers.notes: STR used to be a MUSH, but closed and re-opened as a talker around 2012.

talkers.name: The Chatting Zone
talkers.description: With a highly international userbase, The Chatting Zone (TCZ) is a popular social mud with the option of exploring the many games and locations built by the userbase as well as creating your own. Many games are available to play, including Scrabble, LORD (RPG), GO, Poker, Boggle, Monopoly, Dominoes, Chess, Connect 4, Yahtzee, Lights Out, Bridge, Cribbage, Jeopardy and many, many more. Regular tournaments are held! A heavily used Bulletin Board System with many topics of discussion. The ability to create your own rooms/locations/games with the easy-to-learn/easy-to-master custom coding language. A 24-hour mud with a friendly and helpful admin team who are here to guide you through the first steps of being a newbie in a new world. Get chatting - Get on TCZ!

talkers.name: The Dominion
talkers.notes: The Dominion was run from from 28/09/1996 to 06/01/2004 by MushyPea.

talkers.name: The Gathering
talkers.description:
The Gathering is a fun and exciting place where you can meet people from all around the world. But then aren't all talkers like that? What makes The Gathering so special is that there are no SuperUsers or whatever telling you want you can or cannot do. _YOU_ the users are the ones that do that.
Every user gets to decide if they don't want to hear someone, or if they should be allowed in the group with a unique democratic voting system. So come and try it today - you _KNOW_ you want to.

talkers.name: Universe
talkers.description:
Theme: Our Universe!
The Big Bang marks the instant at which the universe began, when space and time came into existence and all the matter in the cosmos started to expand.

talkers.name: Unreal
talkers.description: A place out of sync with reality

talkers.name: Valdemar
talkers.description: Welcome to Valdemar, a Fantasy Fiction talker for everyone! Faster and more flexible than web-chats, ideal for all ages and free.
talkers.notes:
Valdemar's History...

Valdemar came to life on the evening of Monday 15th September, 1997. We use PG+ code, which we feel is the most powerful and interesting code base in the talker community at this time. We started on a server run by talker.com, but as they grew in popularity the server became slower and slower. As a result, the Valdemar administrators built a server of their own. Finding it impossible to get the server sited at a sensible price, we donated the server to ewtoo.org in order that it may benefit the whole EW-Too talker community.

What can people do on Valdemar?

People do many different things. Most people come to talk with friends using something a lot quicker than the slow and clumsy web-chat services which have proliferated recently. Talkers are much quicker than web-chat, and offer far more facilities for you to express yourself. You can think, sing, emote, or use rooms for private conversations. Every resident has a list which allows them to choose friends, invite them into their room, or ignore those people who just can't help getting on your nerves!
Whatever it is you're looking for, the wide range of people on Valdemar mean you're sure to find someone who shares your interest or passion.

talkers.name: Castle of Desire
talkers.description: A companion talker to the Desire MUD.

talkers.name: Metaverse Internet Chat
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Metaverse.

talkers.name: Bonds of Beauty
talkers.description: Once upon a time, long ago in a far away land, a beautiful maiden was put to sleep by an evil spell. It was rumored that any man brave enough to fight the perils surrounding her castle and kiss the sleeping princess would be her one true love for the rest of their lives. And so begins the tale of Sleeping Beauty.

talkers.name: Retro Chat
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Retro Bar.

talkers.name: Detroit City
talkers.description: Detroit City came about when City closed down

talkers.name: Turf
talkers.description: A Mud/Talker based around the code of Merc and Envy, offering privacy for its residents, whilst retaining MUD features.

talkers.name: Twilight Zone
talkers.description: The Twilight Zone is a Talker based originally on NUTS but highly customized. It was very popular in the mid to late 1990's then disappeared for about 3 years. It's now back and regaining popularity.

talkers.name: Tadiiri
talkers.description: Tadiiri is an 18+ (Role players welcomed) Talker based on a unique concept .. It is basically divided into two halves part based on the John Normal Novels a Gorean Tade city on the southern tip of the Sadar Mountains...The other half is a mid western college town..Rather you wish a place to chat or the role play all are welcome...

talkers.name: Pothole
talkers.description: Pothole is really neat.

talkers.name: Resort City of Venna
talkers.description: A Gorean talker based on the novels of John Norman.

talkers.name: The Whitehouse
talkers.description:
The Whitehouse is a place where people from all over the world can come together and chat, so sit back, relax, and prepare to meet people from all over the world.
There is no age restriction here.

talkers.name: The Abyss
talkers.description:
We here at Abyss sport an interesting atmosphere, friendly admins, bunches of socials, and a small tightly knit community. We are always looking for new residents and are always open to suggestions to make our home better.
The main room is an abyss. A deep, dark pit with multi-colored holes in the walls. Each one of these holes leads to a different room. There are several magic/rune socials, among many others, available to characters.

talkers.name: Asylum
talkers.description:
You pass over a slight rise and are surprised by what you find on the other side. Before you stretches, what appears to be an abandoned section of the asylum. Tall, decaying gray buildings gaze at each other with weary and weathered faces. The wind whips between the buildings and kicks the gray-white dust into the air and onto your clothes. The street is filled with an eerie silence. You can't help but feel that there is something amiss about this place. It almost feels like there is someone, something here that remembers when it wasn't abandoned. Far ahead of you you can almost make out some figures through the swirling dust.
You take a few steps toward the figures and find...

talkers.name: The City
talkers.notes: The City and The City II ran on the same host and port, so are possibly continuations of one another.

talkers.name: Civil Anarchy ][
talkers.disambiguation: Replaced CiViL aNaRcHy.

talkers.name: Club 40
talkers.notes: For ages 40+

talkers.name: Jungle
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Jungle.

talkers.name: The Order
talkers.notes: Age 13+

talkers.name: The Sugar Shack
talkers.description: The Sugar Shack... is a friendly, upbeat talker for all ages. Stop on in, or visit our homepage. All our users are guaranteed privacy and a harassment free environment.

talkers.name: Omega
talkers.notes: Age 13+

talkers.name: Fantasia Emerald Isle
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Emerald Isle.
talkers.description:
Sparkling water splashes over a stone ledge high overhead and into the waters of an emerald green lagoon. The call of an island bird can barely be deemed audible over the loud, seemingly primal roar of the crashing water. The water is warm and inviting, a sharp contrast to the brute power personified by the waterfall. Behind the curtain of water is what seems to be a cave in the rock face.
This world exists for lesbian and bi women.

talkers.name: Fantasia Furry Haven
talkers.description: You find yourself in the center of a large, lush valley...looking out over a peaceful lake. A clear, cold mountain stream flows into the lake from the east. On all sides of the valley are virgin forests with trails leading into and through them. Snow-capped mountains are visible in the distance, beyond the forest. The scent of wild-flowers floats on the soft breezes. Friendship and harmony reign here, as all creatures of the land gather to converse or play. Enter and be at peace...for all are welcomed here...

talkers.name: Fantasia Truth or Date
talkers.description:
Water fountains flank the grand open-air lounge, set overlooking the ocean and appointed with cozy love seats and exotic flower arrangements. The view is spectacular, and the atmosphere is relaxed so that you can take your time absorbing it all as you indulge in drinks and appetizers. As the sun sets, the pounding surf rolls in and the palm trees are silhouetted against the heavenly blue water of the ocean. Padded, high-backed stools sit in front of the bar to your right. The mood is sensual, romantic, almost magical.
Someone whispers, "Care to play a game of Truth or Dare with a lovin' touch?"

talkers.name: Fantasia Buccaneers
talkers.description: Bold & Daring!

talkers.name: Chapel of Love
talkers.disambiguation: Possibly the same talker as Lintilla The Chapel.

talkers.name: Caliburn
talkers.description:
You enter an old abandoned ruin at the edge of town. The ruin is on the edge of a lake that you have walked around many times. But as you enter one room, you see something you've never seen before. Through the crack in one wall, with a broken mirror still hanging there, you see an enchanted land. A land of mystery, of wizards and warlocks, of knights and ladies. A single signpost shows the way to this enchanted land, as you step through the portal. The name on the signpost?
Caliburn.

talkers.name: Brew City
talkers.description: We opened shortly after May 1st, and gave grown to over 100 residency relativly quickly although now we are at one of the slowest periods in talker time, The Summer. We hope you will still visit us and maybe you can help populate us as the summer goes on.

Our talker is just a place to sit back and enjoy talking to your friends, with less lag than a bigger talker. We have a Milwaukee theme to ourselves, and yes beer is somewhat on the mind. We look to expand, and we look to become one of the better known places out there.

talkers.name: CyberEden
talkers.description:
Welcome to CyberEden, a lost paradise on the edge of the galaxy.
CyberEden was built in 1993 and financed by Rivendell International Communications. It is a fully functional CyberSpace station with both public and private rooms available. CyberEden also boasts an additional 20 rooms for your recreation pleasure. Other facilities include a pool room, a full service bar, training rooms, and a massage area.

talkers.name: CyberCoven
talkers.description: A very friendly pagan oriented talker

talkers.name: Deep Space 9
talkers.description:
Welcome to Deep Space 9, a talker brought to you by Rivendell International Communications.
Situated on the edge of Cardassian space, Deep Space 9 sits on the portal of the only stable wormho le into the Gamma Quadrant. This station while owned by the Bajorans is ran with the assistance of the Federation.
Senior station officers are Captain/Gandalf, Zeta and Bigben.

talkers.name: DS Wonderland
talkers.description: DS Wonderland is an adult oriented interactive world, where like-minded individuals come to discuss and experiment with female dominance and the BDSM scene. The staff is open and friendly, and willing to happily answer any questions you may have. We have fantastic games coded into the talker, such as trivia, a full working casino and lots of shops to choose from that offer plenty of clothing and fetish wear. Everyone 18+ is welcome, so stop by and chat with us today!
talkers.notes: Custom codebase written in Python

talkers.name: Dimensions MUX
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Dimensions.
talkers.description: Dimensions is a cool talker with interesting members from all around the world as well as interesting coding, including slot machines and money to buy things from a shop!

talkers.name: Dimensions
talkers.description:
WELCOME to a place of peace in the center of the universe. In every direction, you see portals to other dimensions...
Some lead to the future, some to the past, some to other existences. You may stand at a portal and watch the world pass by...
Or you may sit and visit with others while time and the universe continue around you...
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Dimensions MUX.

talkers.name: Dragon's Lair
talkers.description:
We encourage you to explore the world of the Dragon's Lair. Unlike other Rivendell realms, one can not easily obtain a map here. You will need to use all of your skills to navigate through the maze like trails. Many of the rooms can not be seen by the unknowing mortal eye.
The wizards often play here in the ether... perhaps they may help you on your journey.
talkers.notes: Lists have conflicting information about Dragon's Lair. This might actually be two talkers with the same name.

talkers.name: Dreamscape
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with the other Dreamscape.

talkers.name: Dreamscape
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with the other Dreamscape.

talkers.name: Fantasy Island
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Fantasy Land.

talkers.name: Fantasy Land
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Fantasy Island.

talkers.name: Fear The Penguin
talkers.notes: Possibly evolved into The Politburo.

talkers.name: The Politburo
talkers.notes: Possibly evolved from Fear The Penguin.

talkers.name: Labyrinth
talkers.description: Themed upon the classic movie Labyrinth starring David Bowie and Jennifer Connelly. Set in a fantasy world, with goblins and fairies. Welcome to the world of Labyrinth where nothing is as it seems and things are further than you think.

talkers.name: In Limbo
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Limbo.

talkers.name: Limbo
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with In Limbo.

talkers.name: The Metaverse
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Metaverse Internet Chat.

talkers.name: PL Chat
talkers.description: UK Parent-Link chat rooms

talkers.name: Red Dwarf
talkers.description: Based on the TV program Red Dwarf

talkers.name: The Metro Hotel
talkers.description: Popular, heavily modified NUTS, very different

talkers.name: Excalibur
talkers.description: Brilliant pgplus talker, based on Excalibur

talkers.name: Amiga Forever
talkers.description: The Amiga Forever talker, for amiga fans

talkers.name: Wentworth
talkers.description: Based on the cult series, Prisoner Cell Block H

talkers.name: Miracle
talkers.description: A compact 'from scratch' Su-less code

talkers.name: Terminus
talkers.description: Good staff, great residents, excellent code, basically we're fantastic!

talkers.name: Revival Of Evil
talkers.description: The Revival Of evil Mud is totally original

talkers.name: 1st Mission
talkers.description: Amber's 1st LP-MUD with 100s of areas to play.

talkers.name: Fox
talkers.description: The Su-Free spodding area

talkers.name: GenXXX
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Generation X.

talkers.name: Generation X
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with GenXXX.

talkers.name: YAT
talkers.description: Yet Another Talker

talkers.name: Abbey Road
talkers.description: Beatles, Classic Rock and music in general.

talkers.name: AfterDEATH
talkers.description: A talker based on the theme 'What happens next?', you start off life (or whatever) as a Spirit, and if you're lucky, wind up an Angel or Demon with your own personal room. Once on, you can battle to the death (or whatever) in Valhalla with another user, have a few glasses of beer, or turn into a tap-dancing penguin for the amusement of others. If you're not feeling adventurous though, you can just talk to people. The only rules are no swearing and don't annoy other users. And don't ask for promotion. And no multiple accounts. And don't...

talkers.name: Alpha House
talkers.description: Alpha House is based on a sorority house. Frat house is the jail. We do try to have fun. Nice place to hang out and meet new friends. Like a big, happy family there, and growing!
talkers.notes: Alpha House opened August 10, 1997.

talkers.name: American Romance
talkers.description: American Romance is an over-18 talker. The theme of the talker is romantic places across the Americas. Enjoy laughter with friends or get away to a romantic setting.

talkers.name: Ancient Realms
talkers.notes: This talker was launched in 1995 and replaced in 1997 by Hall of the Silver Dragon, which used the same code.

talkers.name: Dockyard
talkers.notes: This talker-themed MUD closed in 2014.

talkers.name: The Oaktree-house talker
talkers.description: The Oaktree-house is a talker 'for Acorn users to talk about Acorny things'. It aims to be a nice place to talk, without the abusive language etc. often seen elsewhere. Anyone can log in, but if you use the talker regularly you are encouraged to get an account (which is free).
talkers.notes: This talker closed in 2018.

talkers.name: Hall of the Silver Dragon
talkers.notes: This talker-themed MUD was launched in 1997 and used the same code as Ancient Realms. It closed in 2013.

talkers.name: Ancient Worlds
talkers.description: Open to all ages; come and have a good time!

talkers.name: Avalon Isle
talkers.description: Exciting, new, advanced talker run by very friendly staff!

talkers.name: The Black Cat
talkers.description: The Black Cat is a techno club for people who enjoy techno music and the Rave culture. All ages are welcome. But mature subjects only. Chat about your favorite artists, DJ's, or rekkids. Learn about upcoming parties, and meet many more people with your same interests.

talkers.name: Blue Ridge
talkers.description: A talker based on the blue ridge mountains of North Carolina. It is hopefully going to be a peaceful, fun place for users to go to.... it is an 'everyone' talker that we hope people will want to come to.

talkers.name: Brecktown
talkers.description:
Based on the real-life town of Breckenridge, Colorado, the rooms at Brecktown reflect the aura and atmosphere of real places. Wander at your leisure through our town, get to know the locals and for God's sake, don't GAPE at everything!
The talker is open to all ages, all opinions and we welcome maturity and respect for others.

talkers.name: Chakrams & Scrolls
talkers.description: This talker is based on Xena: Warrior Princess and is a place where fans of the show can meet and discuss episodes, etc. Many games to play and new commands in this ancient Greek world!

talkers.name: CiViL aNaRcHy
talkers.disambiguation: Replaced by CiViL aNaRcHy ][.

talkers.name: City Of Dreams
talkers.description: City of Dreams is an under-18 talker. Join everyone there and follow your dreams, laugh and have lots of fun!

talkers.name: Cross Roads
talkers.description: CrossRoads, The Next Generation, is a place for friends, both old and new, to gather and chat about almost anything. Opened shortly after the original CrossRoads closed in early 1997, CrossRoads TNG carries on the tradition started by Jesse, Sparky and all the others who made CrossRoads one of the mosr popular talkers on the net. Please stop by, kick your shoes off, grab something to drink and enjoy your stay.

talkers.name: Cyber City
talkers.description: Cyber City is based on the theme of what it would be like if people actually lived in Cyberspace. it is set up very much like a city. This talker is open to all ages, so come on in and enjoy the fun!

talkers.name: Eye of the World
talkers.description: The Eye of the World was started in February of 1995, based on the Wheel of Time saga by Robert Jordan. It is not a role-playing environment. It IS a very colorful, friendly environment where we encourage users to take part in the life of the talker. We do this by giving our users the opportunity to own one of our 36 rooms.

talkers.name: Harem
talkers.description: Harem is a talker for adults 18 and over. Harem is a mature atmosphere, dedicated to alternitive life-styles, role-play and interacting with others.

talkers.name: Heaven
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Heaven.

talkers.name: Heaven
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Heaven.
talkers.description: The heaven: el mejor chat en espaniol del mundo. :)

talkers.name: Hideaway
talkers.description: The place to run and hide...your fantasy getaway! Anything you could imagine is waiting for you at Hideaway. If you don't see it, then ask for it...your wish just may come true for you! But don't get your hopes up! ;) If anything, just come and get away from the people you despise most at the other talkers.

talkers.name: An Illville
talkers.description: A talker based on a city where everybody is game.

talkers.name: Insane World
talkers.description: It's an insane world out there, so why can't it be an insane internet world? That's what the talker is all about.

talkers.name: Interstate America
talkers.description: Lonesome is a truck driver from Texas. We based this talker on his journeys. We welcome all travelers to come in and have some coffee, or just sit around to shoot the breeze. Ya may be surprised! Ya'll come see us!

talkers.name: Invasion
talkers.description: This is a talker where anything can happen, but watch out 'cause you could be abducted! This talker has it's own spaceship. You may go to Earth or Mars. Visit with the cute aliens. Keep watch though because they could be in disguise!

talkers.name: Kenbridge
talkers.description: The Jungle is a fun and friendly place to chat!

talkers.name: The Jungle
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Jungle.
talkers.description: The Jungle is a fun and friendly place to chat!

talkers.name: Journeys
talkers.description: Journeys is an all-ages talker based on travelling (Journeys :-). Everyone is welcome here to meet new people of all ages and backgrounds and enjoy themselves. Enjoy your Journeys!

talkers.name: KAOS
talkers.description: Key kids! KAOS is the best talker there is! Hands down! See ya there!!

talkers.name: Mountain Ranch
talkers.description: A BDSM talker for those who areserious about their D/s lifestyles. Come and make your fantasies and dreams come true with us!

talkers.name: The Movie Megaplex
talkers.description: The Movie Megaplex is a relaxing atmosphere to, well, relax! :) All decent topics are welcome, keeping in mind that we are a talker, not a mud, mush, or anything of that sort.

talkers.name: Myst
talkers.description: Myst is a new and exciting talker set in the idyllic surrounds of a mystical island. Operating in real time, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, Myst is a free and secure chat-service for people from around the world to meet, talk and exchange messages. Myst is an Ew-Too style talker, based on the popular PlayGround96 code, with heavy modifications made in presentation, features and usage.

talkers.name: Pan Pipes
talkers.description: This talker is a zoo talker and fur friendly for those looking for good friends to chat with.

talkers.name: Paradise Island
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Paradise.

talkers.name: Paris By Night
talkers.description: -=[Paris By Night]=- Who Never Dreamed of Visiting Paris, The Most Romantic City in the World?  You Are Looking For A Romantic Place?  You Are Looking For A Funny Place?  Come On Paris By Night, Chat in The Louvre, Meet In The Eiffel Tower, Have Fun in The Hotel We Are All Waiting For You!  -=[Paris By Night]=- Main Port: 3210 Sysadmin(s): Arny & Spicey Who Port: 3212 Http:// www.talker.com/paris

talkers.name: House Party
talkers.description: Looking for a great place to hang out and chat with your friends around the world. If your answer is yes then come to House Party. You can play a nice game of paintball, send ascii pictures to your friends, or just hang out and chat. Lots more fun stuff is waiting for you.

talkers.name: Party Time
talkers.description: A talker for all ages. Come, chat, play games, or do whatever else you want to do. We are continually updating code to make your stay more enjoyable. Stop on by and check us out.

talkers.name: Philadelphia
talkers.description:
A general talker, based on the City of Philadelphia. Streets and points of interest in the city comprise the majority of the talker.
Welcome To Philly The Talker! This talker is running TalkerOs which was written by William. Based on Nuts 3.3.3 which was written by Neil Robertson. Our original code was modified by Whizkid. We welcome users over 18 years of age who have an interest in chatting with others from all over the globe.

talkers.name: Reality
talkers.description: A fun place to go!!

talkers.name: Realm Of The Seeker
talkers.description: Realm of the Seeker is based on the 'Sword of Truth' series of books by Terry Goodkind. Come join one of the most promising talkers online.

talkers.name: Rome
talkers.description: Ancient Rome was a myriad of contradiction and irony, a military-based civilization celebrating the beauty of classical Greece, architecture, poetry and philosophy, but also thriving on brutality of amphitheatres and slavery and on the politics of religion. Although too complex for acurate representation in our humble talker, the ancient empire inspires this atmosphere of pleasure & terror, peace & imprisionment, spirituality & passion. The purpose here is to break physical limits through communication. Make sure you are prepared.

talkers.name: Xanth
talkers.description: Xanth: you have read the books by Piers Anthony, now come play the MUD loosely based on his series. 'Xanth' and all references to it are copyrighted by Piers Anthony and are used by us only by his permission.

talkers.name: Utopia
talkers.description: Utopia is a talker for adults that started in 1995. We only permit users over 18 and strive to maintain a warm, friendly and mostly mature atmosphere, while still having fun. Utopia is set in an imaginary town where you will find a growing yet still close-knit community of wonderful people.

talkers.name: Tornado Alley
talkers.description: A weather-related talker

talkers.name: The Tropics
talkers.description: The breeze in your hair and the sound of the steel drums This the tropics. This talker's theme is one of the islands where every thing is eire man.

talkers.name: Tyson's Corner
talkers.description: A unique 'Mall' atmosphere talker for college aged students

talkers.name: Way Out West
talkers.description: West is a friendly place set in a wild west town. It's really for all ages, but anything usually goes ;) (gotta love private rooms ;) It's laid back, fun, and the people are nice and always ready to help out a newbie. So why don't you stop into town one day? You'll like it... Trust me ;)

talkers.name: WhoDunIt
talkers.description: WhoDunIt. A talker with a twist. Come solve the mystery of Who Dun It (the murder), what room, and with what weapon. If this is not your cup of tea, please come and enjoy the chat and all the neat features in this new talker.

talkers.name: Wild West
talkers.description: Western theme, +18 talker. Meet people, have fun and enjoy!

talkers.name: Writer's BBS Chat
talkers.description: A friendly place to meet authors and poets. Discussions range from using the Internet to pets to getting one's writing published for the first time. All are welcome to join in

talkers.name: School Chat
talkers.description: This talker is based on a school theme and is open to all ages. Feel free to ask any of our staff if you have any problems.

talkers.name: Seventh Heaven
talkers.description: If you're looking for a fun, friendly and relaxing place to hang out for a while, drop by Seventh Heaven. We're an all ages talker open to anyone and everyone, as long as you respect one another and have fun! Drop by and play a game of Tic-Tac-Toe with Zeus, the coolest bot on the web. Or try your hand at Hangman. Think you're smart? Answer today's Riddle. Trust me, there's tons to do, great people to meet and fabulous friends to make. So come on into Heaven!

talkers.name: Silver Circle
talkers.description: Silver Circle is a highly modified PG96 talker aimed at Wiccans, Pagans and spiritually open minded people on the internet. Our goal is to share ideas, thoughts, wisdom, laughs and some good times. Silver Circle also serves as a stepping stone and as a source of a wealth of information for those who seek information about Paganism and Wicca. We are open to people of all paths; the only thing we ask is that you have an open mind.

talkers.name: Theatre Des Vampires
talkers.description: EW-too based telnet talker that has been up and running for two years. It's been home to a small, but growing community of residents interested in everything from vampires to books, music, digital art and the supernatural.

talkers.name: Shadow Realms
talkers.description: A talker designed to run the White Wolf (tm) World of Darkness System (tm). Incorporates Vampires, Werewolves, Changelings and Wraiths with the aid of storytellers.

talkers.name: Slap Shot
talkers.description: A great place to hang out and chat with new friends, or old friends and have a few laughs. Don't forget to bring your skates!

talkers.name: Sim City
talkers.description: Sim City is based on the popular computer game Sim City. We have a great staff and friendly users. There are many functions and commands that other talkers do not offer, we aim to be different. So take a chance and drop by for a visit, we bet you will like it and become a regular user :)

talkers.name: Sommerland II
talkers.description: Sommerland is a talker open to anyone who has an open mind and isn't oppressed by people of different sexual orientations. This is not a sex talker, but rather a place for people to relax, have fun, and discuss issues in a themepark setting.
talkers.disambiguation: It appears this talker replaced the original IFORMS-based Sommerland.

talkers.name: Spellbinder
talkers.description: This is an all age talker with a witchcraft theme. There are numerous facts and and fiction about the Wiccan ways surrounding SpellBinder. Merry Meet and Merry Part!!

talkers.name: Land of Confusion
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with State of Confusion University.

talkers.name: State of Confusion University
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Land of Confusion.

talkers.name: Strawberry Fields
talkers.description: Let us take you down, cause we're goin' to Strawberry Fields, nothing is real, and nothing to get .nuked about :) Strawberry Fields Forever!

talkers.name: The Sushi Bar
talkers.description: The Sushi Bar is an adult, all-kinds chat catering to whatever one's preferences may be. *Anyone* over he age of 18 who wants to meet friends, indulge in *whatever*, and is tolerant of other peoples' *whatevers* is welcome to join in.

talkers.name: Home Sweet Home
talkers.description:
A new talker, the theme is based around a home. Rooms are Living Room, Dining Room, etc! A cozy place to come and enjoy yourself! This talker has been up for 3 weeks, we have *java* chat
Open for people of all ages, talker rated "G". Stop by!

talkers.name: Soaring Emporium
talkers.description: Great talker, lots of special features like roulette, slot machines, black jack etc... There's several talkers linked together so you can go between the talkers without logging off... Not too many users yet, but the ones who go there are very friendly!

talkers.name: Flex's Saloon
talkers.description: Great talker, lots of special features like roulette, slot machines, black jack etc... There's several talkers linked together so you can go between the talkers without logging off... Not too many users yet, but the ones who go there are very friendly!

talkers.name: The Funk
talkers.description: 100% more cheese than other talkers ...

talkers.name: Republic
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Republic Inn.
talkers.notes: Republic is one of a very few talkers that does not have any admins.
talkers.description: Republic is a talker with a difference. No superusers. No wizards. No staff. Just people.

talkers.name: Scout Talk
talkers.notes: "For Kids"

talkers.name: Republic Inn
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Republic.

talkers.name: Majick
talkers.description: A talker based on the majicks of the talker universe, ..many new coding and commands, ..bustling little place, ..not to old, ..come join us at Majick.

talkers.name: Lintilla The Chapel
talkers.disambiguation: Possibly the same talker as Chapel of Love.

talkers.name: The Sport Zone
talkers.description:
The "Lintilla Sport Zone" is Lintilla's first foray into a talker with a sports theme. The administration of the Sport Zone and it's regular users are all either athletes, coaches, or avid sports fans who enjoy a good chat about a whole variety of professional and amateur sports from around the globe.
A hilighted feature is the group of sport themed chat rooms -- each representing a particular sport ranging from soccer to baseball.

The mood is relaxed and friendly and we of the Sport Zone would like you to be our welcomed guest.

talkers.name: Crystal Forest
talkers.description:
Crystal Forest has been built around a MYSTICAL or Magical theme with room names like 'Stonehenge' and 'Meadow', and of course a dozen or so others. It's meant to give the user a feeling of tranquility and peace.
There isn't any promotional process to go through or any such madness.... we welcome everyone. From your very first login you are considered a 'resident'. We invite you to come and at least visit us, we'd love the chance to say 'hi'.

talkers.name: Crystal Palace
talkers.description: The talkers are here to give a laid-back atmosphere for those over 18 years old. It focuses heavily on roleplaying one's personal life-style and interacting with others.

talkers.name: Frontiers
talkers.description: The Frontiers Project ('Frontiers') is a multi-user environment which can be used for the purpose of international socialising on the Internet. Though not dissimilar to other forms of multi-user Internet resource (eg MOO, MUD, MUX, etc), the Frontiers environment is simultaneously a talker and game system.
talkers.notes: Frontiers is being written as part of a final year Software Engineering project by Unicorn, a student at the Sheffield Hallam University in England. However, Frontiers will continue to exist and grow even after Unicorn has spread his wings (hold on, surely that should be 'Pegasus'...) and gone off into the big wide world to be unemployed.

talkers.name: The Farm
talkers.description: Stop on by and meet the Amish and their animals.

talkers.name: Pern
talkers.description:
Pern is a chat server modeled after the world created by Anne McCaffrey in her series The DragonRiders of Pern. It's a friendly place dedicated to chatting and meeting people the world over.
You'll find a lot of friendly people there. Pern is hosted by Cubby and Thangalin. Our coders are Dave Xavier and Ken Savage and the site is courtesy of MadPoet and the Loopers. Special thanks to Bono in developing programs for user utilites on the OOT code and for the Pern maps. You will also find a friendly and helpful team of wizards. We pride ourselves on our friendly and diverse user base.

talkers.name: The ShadowGate
talkers.description:
The ShadowGate is a roleplay talker based on the "Vampire: The Masquerade" series of books developed by Justin Achilli and by White Wolf Publishing Inc.
While there are no age restrictions, we suggest 18+ as content is not always monitored. Whether you're a V:tM veteran or a person who just thinks vampires are cool, drop in and give us a try. Newcomers are always welcome.

talkers.name: E N E R G Y
MuMu Land
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Land of Mu.

talkers.name: The Land of Mu
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with MuMu Land.
talkers.description: This is the Majestic land of Mu. A place for people of any race, religion, age, gender or sexual preference *grin* to gather and converse with one another. The Land of Mu is a thematic talker. Our theme is that of Magic and Mystery.

talkers.name: On Stage
talkers.description:
You float down slowly, onto a hardwood stage...the curtains are drawn, and it is pitch black, you can hear the antisipation of everyone on stage. The crowd grows silent, as the curtains are thrust open with emensity, the lights flicker on, putting you in the spot light... you start what you rehearsed and converse with the other people on stage..
An all age place to chat, open 24/7

talkers.name: The Forever Beyond
talkers.description:
The Forever Beyond is an all-ages chat talker that specializes in computers, fun, and interesting conversations.
We are a talker for all ages, with color. We have the Starship Enterprise section and a plethora of interesting users from all over. The server is running only this talker, so the lag is at a minimum. Come on over for a good time, because this is new! Up since Jan 1997 and it has only a 5 to 10 user load at night, CST. Come on by!

talkers.name: Lara
talkers.description:
18+ Gorean City of Lara, based on books by John Norman.
A unique city of Gor, where peace and tranquility can be found on this concentual port or/one can role-play in the non-concentual area. Follow where your path may lead you and come to visit.

talkers.name: Talk of the Town
talkers.notes: Talk of the Town closed in 2015.

talkers.name: Flirt Town
talkers.notes: Flirt Town closed in 2019.

talkers.name: Lighthouse
talkers.description: The LightHouse is a great fun place to hang out. With a fantastic web interface and an offline who, you can always see when your friends are on. There are lotsa people there to chat with. They are fun, intelligent and always there for you to lean on and get cheered up! Drop by, you won't regret it! Also the program their running JATS rocks! Offers lotsa commands and stuff for everyone!!

talkers.name: Walt
talkers.description: A Disney-based talker

talkers.name: House Party
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with the other House Party.

talkers.name: House Party
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with the other House Party.

talkers.name: Hectic House
talkers.notes: The first NUTS talker, from 1992.

talkers.name: Barenaked On Ice
talkers.description:
We are simply put, the most fun place online. We only have one rule: respect others. We don't care if you swear, make raunchy jokes, sit on people, etc. All we ask is that you don't attack others. Aside from all that, we are a unique talker because we chose the band, Barenaked Ladies as our theme (if that isn't serious fandom, I don't know what is!) and there are a lot of goofy rooms and commands, including .kraft, which has you tossing boxes of Kraft Dinner at each other :)
Besides, if you come on, you get to see why they voted me "User Most Likely To Go To School Naked!" Can't beat that, eh?

talkers.name: Pod's Inn
talkers.description: Pod's Inn is a JOOT based talker that welcome users of all ages. We are striving to have a good talker that will welcome new users, and make them feel at home! We would appreciate your stopping by, and giving us a try. And tell them Footsie personaly invited you! I am there quite often. I'd be glad to see you! Thanks :)

talkers.name: Dragon's Isle
talkers.notes:
The Lost Isles Talkers consist of two talkers. Forgotten Isle was created first with a general theme. It is currently running on the SiNCO code.
See also: Forgotten Isle.

talkers.name: The Rainbow Room
talkers.description:
The Rainbow Room is the friendliest cyber community online. The Rainbow room is a small talker which seems to attract dynamic people who enjoy intelligent conversation and many laughs. This is a family talker that is open to all ages for people of the lesbian/bisexual/gay/transgendered communities and their friends.
This talker encourages users to participate strongly by contributing rooms, room descriptions, and other assorted files. The Rainbow Room is constantly changing with the users and the seasons.
On this talker users are also encouraged to take advantage of the standing offer to make tailor made special occasion rooms, perfect for net.weddings. One last thing, Bottom, our bot, we like him, hope you do too!

talkers.name: Weave's World
talkers.notes:
Weave's World ran from 1996 to 2001, hosted on a 486.
Read more on Vince Weaver's homepage.

talkers.name: Acadia
talkers.description: Acadia is a NUTS based talker with modifications being done by Jeff. The main theme of Acadia is that of a small community making it a very friendly place to have a chat.

talkers.name: The DarkSide of Nothing
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Darkside.

talkers.name: Elsewhere
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Elsewhere.
talkers.notes: Elsewhere was what eventually became Foothills.

talkers.name: Elsewhere
talkers.description: Elsewhere is a EW-too based talker. The name and theme come from Canadian singer Sarah McLachlan's song of the same title and was created as a place where people could go to have fun and enjoy friends. We've tried to create an atmosphere in the Orchids (our main room) that is comfortable for everyone. We are very much like a family...that is growing every day. So come join the family!
talkers.notes: Watch out...Dj might hit you with his famous (or is that infamous?) typo-bomb...KhYbErX might play a round of basketball with you (I won't even tell you where the basketball comes from)...hObBeS definitely out-mischiefs Calvin (where did he get all those waterballoons anyways?)...Warlock is forever picking up pins (I guess he has nothing better to do)...tie yourself to something stationary so eXtrEmIs doesn't snowball you off the program...but whatever you do, don't say "duck" when Amory is logged on!
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Elsewhere.

talkers.name: Elysium
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Elysium.

talkers.name: The Elysium
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Elysium.

talkers.name: Looney Bin
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with The Looney Bin.

talkers.name: The Looney Bin
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Looney Bin.

talkers.name: Oasis
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with the other Oasis.

talkers.name: Oasis
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with the other Oasis.

talkers.name: Olympus
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Olympia.

talkers.name: Olympia
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Olympus.

talkers.name: Paradise
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Paradise Island.

talkers.name: Spaceboy's Multiple Worlds: Tower of High Sorcery
The Tavern (at the End of the Universe)
The Tower
talkers.description: A Medieval Talker

talkers.name: DarkRealm
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Dark Realms.

talkers.name: Cactus
talkers.description: Coolest internet talker in the world.

talkers.name: 36 Chambers
talkers.note: Please note that "36 Chambers" is restricted to those who study the martial arts. You must pre-register before being granted permission to use this site.

talkers.name: The Reference Desk
talkers.note: Please note that "The Reference Desk" is used for educational purposes and is not an open talker for social chat

talkers.name: Bloodstone's Gorean Haven
talkers.description: This is a strictly 18+ roleplay/learning talker, based on the John Norman series. If you are unfamiliar with the series, are 18+, and would like to know more, feel free to stop by and check us out.

talkers.name: Caged Heat
talkers.description: A BDSM talker set inside a prison. Lots of fun, but please be over 18 years of age.

talkers.name: Hidden Desires
talkers.description: A place for those over 18 to explore their Hidden Desires. From BDSM, fetishes, and even Vanilla sensuality!
A groovy place to hang out and make some friends. Please be 18 or older!

talkers.name: Milisake
talkers.description: A groovy place to hang out and make some friends. Please be 18 or older!

talkers.name: Morning Star: Across the Horizon
talkers.description: A SWR coded modified. This mud has dimension shifting and time traveling. It is also an RPG mud. There is restricted PKing. The MUD offers custom ships and player homes. We will be offering quest further down the line. We are still a young mud.

talkers.name: Mount Olympus
talkers.description: Tired of talking to the same old annoying people day after day. Come talk to the annoying people at our talker site instead.

talkers.name: Myanmar Talker
talkers.description: A place for all Burmese and non-Burmese to hang out!

talkers.name: NoWhereLand
talkers.description: Realm of the Fab Four! - The Beatles! If you are 18+ - Let's ROCK N ROLL!

talkers.name: The Promised Land
talkers.notes: Christian-based talker, open to all ages

talkers.name: Sommerland
talkers.disambiguation: It apears this iforms talker was replaced by the ncohafmuta-based Sommerland II.

talkers.name: Woodstock
talkers.description: Welcome to Woodstock, a multi user chat line based on the festival in 1969.

talkers.name: Darkside
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with Darkside of Nothing.

talkers.name: Dark Realms
talkers.disambiguation: Not to be confused with DarkRealm.

talkers.name: Brock University
talkers.notes: Open to students only.
